FlowOrchestration.name: FlowOrchestration
FlowOrchestration.description: Represents the details of an orchestration definition.

ActiveVersionId.description: The ID of the active orchestration version. This field is a relationship field.

ApiName.description: The API name of the the orchestration.

ApiVersion.description: The API version of the active orchestration or the last saved orchestration.

AverageRunTime.description: The average duration of an orchestration run that has completed without error.

CompletionRate.description: The percentage of the total number of orchestration runs that have completed without error.

Description.description: The description of the flow orchestration.

FailedRunCount.description: The number of orchestration runs that have failed.

InstalledPackageName.description: The API name of the installed package that the orchestration is a part of.

IsCitizenEnabled.description: Indicates whether the orchestration can be modified by non-admins. Valid value is False.

IsOverridable.description: Indicates whether the orchestration that's part of a managed package is overridable.

IsTemplate.description: Indicates whether the orchestration record is a template.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

ManageableState.description: Specifies the managable state of the orchestration that's contained in a package.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with the orchestration record.

OrchestrationType.description: The orchestration's flow type. FlowType consolidates ProcessType and TriggerType into one field. FlowType is used with permissions, so admins can control access to each flow type.

OverriddenById.description: The ID of the orchestration that's overriding the current orchestration.

OverriddenOrchestrationId.description: The ID of the orchestration that the current orchestration is overriding.

RunCount.description: The number of orchestration runs that have been started across all orchestration versions.

SourceTemplateId.description: The ID of the template that the orchestration was created from.

TriggerType.description: Specifies the trigger type for a record-triggered orchestration.
